id.description: The unique ID of this alert notification.

type.description: The type of alert channel (SMS, Slack, Webhook, etc).

alertConfig.description: The configuration which was used to send the alert.

notificationResult.description: The result of sending the alert notification.For example, this could be the response body of the Webhook.

timestamp.description: The time that the alert was sent.

checkAlertId.description: The ID of the check alert.

alertChannelId.description: The ID of the alert channel which this alert was sent to.

checkResultId.description: The ID of the corresponding check result.
